preference.name: SUBSCMPL_LRD_TARGET_QUERY_NAMES
preference.preference_description: Specifies the name and input attribute count (delimited by a colon (:)) of the query that Teamcenter uses to search for a material to map the incoming lab report declaration (LRD) to the respective material in Teamcenter. Default value: Substance Compliance LRD - Get Target Object From Material Info:2 Parameters: ID and Name

context.name: Teamcenter
context.value: Substance Compliance LRD - Get Target Object From Material Info:2
